title: KDP Print Cost Rising in 2023
description:
KDP is increasing their print prices. If you don't change your prices, you'll have to settle for lower royalties.

Time stamps:
00:00 KDP print cost going up
00:33 One time bulk list price update
00:47 Individual list price update
01:03 Details provided by KDP
02:30 Beverage of choice
02:48 Bonus Tip on Pricing

Website mentioned:
https://kdp.amazon.com/en_US/help/topic/GPGVYM9KWTYLD2GD

Don't forget to Book the like / thumbs up button, it means a lot to me (and it's free).

Hope you enjoyed and got something out from today's video :) 

Till next time,

~Andy
